page.title: 17A CHELTENHAM GIRL'S DAY
page.content: I live in Fernleigh Cresent which has a good view over part of the Cotswold Hills.Leckhampton Hill stands out in particular and is very beautiful.I wake up each day and look out on our garden.I get changed into my summer school uniform which is a checked_blue dress.I wash,comb my hair and go down for breakfast which consists of cereal,toast and a cup of tea.I brush my teeth and get ready for school.My mother takes me to school in our Cortina Estate.It takes about 5 mins. for it is about a mile away.When we arrive we wait for the whistle and when we go in we have lessons till 20 past 10 then we have assembly.After play there are more lessons till 12 o'clock.School dinner follows,then more lessons.At home again,I play ball games with my friends and we talk about things we have done that day.
